ybImage.description: The AMI to be used in this region.

AccessKey.description: Access key for the cloud provider. This helps to authenticate the user and get access to the provider.

Alert.description: Alert definition. Used to send an alert notification.

acknowledgedTime.description: Timestamp at which the alert was acknowledged

nextNotificationTime.description: Time of the next notification attempt

notificationAttemptTime.description: Time of the last notification attempt

notificationsFailed.description: Count of failures to send a notification

notifiedState.description: Alert state in the last-sent notification

resolvedTime.description: Timestamp at which the alert was resolved

defaultSmtpSettings.description: Use health check notification SMTP settings

AlertChannelParams.description: Supertype for channel params for different channel types.

active.description: Is configured alerts raised or not

defaultDestination.description: Is default destination used for this config

durationSec.description: Duration in seconds, while condition is met to raise an alert

maintenanceWindowUuids.description: Maintenance window UUIDs, applied to this alert config

AlertConfigurationTarget.description: Alert target. Set to `all`, or specify one or more target UUIDs.

active.description: Is configured alerts raised or not

defaultDestination.description: Is default destination used for this config

maintenanceWindowUuids.description: Maintenance window UUIDs, applied to this alert config

thresholdConditionReadOnly.description: Is alert threshold condition read-only or configurable

thresholdInteger.description: Is alert threshold integer or floating point

thresholdReadOnly.description: Is alert threshold read-only or configurable

AlertConfigurationThreshold.description: Alert configuration threshold. Conditions can be either greater than a specified value, or less than a specified value.

condition.description: Threshold condition (greater than, or less than)

activeAlertNotificationIntervalMs.description: Period, which is used to send active alert notifications

reportOnlyErrors.description: Trigger an alert only for errors

sendAlertsToYb.description: Send alerts to YB as well as to customer

statusUpdateIntervalMs.description: Status update of alert interval, in milliseconds

Audit.description: Audit logging for requests and responses

maxHistory.description: Max number of days up till which logs are kept

outputToFile.description: Flag to enable/disable audit logs output to file

outputToStdout.description: Flag to enable/disable audit logs output to stdout
